item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, May 28, 2025 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: AutoThink – Boosts local LLM performance with adaptive reasoning (179 points | 22 comments)
2. As a developer, my most important tools are a pen and a notebook (17 points | 14 comments)
3. Show HN: My LLM CLI tool can run tools now, from Python code or plugins (318 points | 119 comments)
4. A thought on JavaScript "proof of work" anti-scraper systems (21 points | 7 comments)
5. Another way electric cars clean the air: study says brake dust reduced by 83% (25 points | 9 comments)
6. A UEFI app that sends LLDP-MED pkt at boot to negotiate PoE+ power before the OS (119 points | 25 comments)
7. The Ingredients of a Productive Monorepo (99 points | 35 comments)
8. Square Theory (531 points | 109 comments)
9. The Level Design Book (142 points | 20 comments)
10. Look ma, no bubbles designing a low-latency megakernel for Llama-1B (119 points | 18 comments)
11. Developing first petahertz-speed phototransistor in ambient conditions (13 points | discuss)
12. OpenTPU: Open-Source Reimplementation of Google Tensor Processing Unit (TPU) (78 points | 12 comments)
13. Pyrefly vs. Ty: Comparing Python's two new Rust-based type checkers (307 points | 117 comments)
14. There Is No Diffie-Hellman but Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (74 points | 23 comments)
15. How a hawk learned to use traffic signals to hunt more successfully (377 points | 113 comments)
16. Singularities in Space-Time Prove Hard to Kill (10 points | 3 comments)
17. An Extreme Cousin for Pluto? Possible Dwarf Planet at Solar System Edge (11 points | discuss)
18. DWARF as a Shared Reverse Engineering Format (4 points | discuss)
19. Mustard Watches (1990) (59 points | 23 comments)
20. Using Postgres pg_test_fsync tool for testing low latency writes (25 points | 4 comments)
21. A privilege escalation from Chrome extensions (2023) (42 points | 5 comments)
22. Running GPT-2 in WebGL: Rediscovering the Lost Art of GPU Shader Programming (125 points | 31 comments)
23. Space Selfie (120 points | 27 comments)
24. Launch HN: Relace (YC W23) – Models for fast and reliable codegen (89 points | 45 comments)
25. Every wondered how Facebook spoofs Gmail message list snippet text? (48 points | 18 comments)
26. BGP handling bug causes widespread internet routing instability (281 points | 130 comments)
27. The Hobby Computer Culture (130 points | 63 comments)
28. Nanoparticle-cell link enables EM wireless programming of transgene expression (25 points | 1 comment)
29. LumoSQL (226 points | 81 comments)
30. Semicolons bring the drama; that's why I love them (85 points | 82 comments)
